response.raw_message_text:
```json
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("Prior Arrest", "low", "One non-convicted arrest at a young age suggests limited prior involvement in the criminal justice system."),
    ("Age", "medium", "The individual is at an age where recidivism rates can vary, with younger adults sometimes exhibiting higher risk."),
    ("Ethnicity", "medium", "While not a definitive indicator, certain socio-economic factors associated with Hispanic communities may influence recidivism."),
    ("Marital Status and Living Arrangement", "low", "Living with others and not being married does not inherently signal high risk."),
    ("Education", "low", "A high school diploma is achieved by many individuals without indicating future criminal behavior."),
    ("Employment", "medium", "Having a job can be positive, but limited employment history may still leave room for other contributing factors."),
    ("Substance Use", "low", "No recent drug use and minimal alcohol consumption suggest low risk of substance-related offenses."),
    ("Mental Health (Depression)", "high", "Chronic or severe depression is a significant predictor of recidivism, especially when left untreated."),
    ("Family Background", "medium", "Growing up in an urban area with both biological parents provides some stability, but early life experiences can still influence future behavior."),
    ("Religious Beliefs", "low", "Personal views on religion not directly correlating to criminal behavior.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}
```

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 11 inches and weighs between 150 and 174 lbs. He has never been married and is currently not living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
